tool_description: An API showing all the latest Raith Rovers news from various Scottish newspapers/publications.
name: Raith Rovers News
title: Raith Rovers News

api_list.name: Get Raith Rovers news form a specific source
api_list.description: Gets news articles about Raith Rovers from a specific news/publication source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://raith-rovers-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/BBC"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "raith-rovers-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://raith-rovers-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{publicationid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "raith-rovers-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Raith Rovers news articles
